entry.title: Silent in the Trees
entry.summary:
Author: mieczystiles

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,259Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 82

Summary: Just then, another rumble reverberates around. Stiles looks up, startled, but it’s not the clouds.It’s a wolf.It stares right at him from between the two trees that flank the clearing, eyes glowing, a vibrant shade of blue in the relative darkness.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,393Chapters: 1/17Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Through Another's Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kilani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,457Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 88

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? He’s engaged to Derek Hale—a man he’s sure doesn’t like him, let alone want to marry him. With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.title: Stiles Come Home
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceAce281990

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 210,663Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 674

Summary: Stiles was kidnapped from the hospital, hours after being born. He was raised by a misguided spark who thought he was hers and then taken away and placed in foster care. Sheriff John Stilinski had never stopped looking for his son, efforts doubling once his wife died and his son's case went cold. When he gets the call that the woman who had stolen his son had come forward, confessed, and he provides what he needs to prove that Stiles is his son, he is elated, emotional, and scared. What had his son went through all of those years and could he work to be the father he had always wanted to be?And could he answer Stiles' first question. "Are you Batman?"

entry.title: Tell It to My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: LilOak

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,831Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 344

Summary: Stiles hadn’t wanted to get off the rink once he was in it but the Beacon Hills high school hockey team were rather impatient when it came time for their training slot. He was well and truly reacquainted with the ice, and not because he fell on his ass, twice, whilst attempting some of his more difficult moves. He didn’t feel ready to go home just yet. The idea of going home to an empty house and a microwave meal made his stomach twist and churn. He figured it wouldn’t hurt to hang around for the hockey gorillas to finish beating each other up so he could grab some extra time in the rink. If Stiles was being honest with himself maybe he enjoyed watching the boys get riled up and sweaty.Derek was so focused intently on getting to the exit as quick as possible that he didn’t notice at first that there was still someone on the ice…Or the figure skater/hockey player au no one asked for

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,063Chapters: 22/26Kudos: 291

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,253Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 142

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, “I’m still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.”“Yep! Derek’s my boyfriend! We’re totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we’re no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we’re both very affectionate behind closed doors. It’s kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn’t even like me when we’re in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we’re just a misunderstood couple, y’know… Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We’re basically this generation’s Romeo and… Miguel.”Melissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.“If you and Derek are boyfriends, you won’t have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.”Stiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, “Dinner?!”

entry.title: Beneath the Surface
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,834Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Derek has always lived for the pack. They were everything to him.But when the unexplainable begins to happen, he realizes that not everything is as it seems. A silent and deadly creature from the lake appears in his life—Stiles.A presence that draws him in ways he can't understand.Between the rising tension and the impending danger, Derek begins to realize that what connects them is more than just fate.As Stiles' secrets begin to reveal themselves, Derek finds himself in a risky game between truth and destruction. Their connection is real, but what that means for the future of the pack and for Derek himself, he doesn't yet know.One thing is certain: nothing will ever be the same.

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,931Chapters: 8/15Kudos: 195

Summary: Stiles just wants to make sure his friends don’t die from the next supernatural problem that graces their doorstep. Derek just wants to focus on strengthening his pack (and ignoring the itch under his skin whenever Stiles is near).When Stiles discovers a disturbing string of murders that bring him to the preserve, he and Derek are abducted by an unknown group and locked in a basement across the country with no escape. Each night, the two are subjected to odd methods of torture for seemingly no reason, and each day, there is nothing to keep them occupied but themselves. In circumstances neither could have imagined possible, hidden truths are revealed and connections are made with permanent consequences.To survive and escape with their sanity intact, they’ll have to figure out how to work together.Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,305Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 283

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”

entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,500Chapters: 24/55Kudos: 308

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?
